sourcesContent:
export const upgradematerialsGen = {
  btnGeneral: `Details`,
  btnList: `Find / Farm`,
  btnTable: `Upgrades`,
}

export const upgradematerials = [
  {
    id: 1,
    title: `Scrap Iron`,
    description: `Iron dregs mined in Ashina.

    Widely used for basic reinforcement, it can serve as a base material for Prosthetic Tool upgrades.
    
    Ashina is burdened with thick snow and infertile land, but the scrap iron dug from her soil is anything but crude.`,
    value: `Common`,
    valueSym: 'C',
    usage: [
      { id: 1, upgrade: `Lazulite Sacred Flame (Tier 5 Loaded Spear)`, qty: 3, },
      { id: 2, upgrade: `Lazulite Shuriken (Tier 6 Flame Barrel)`, qty: 6, },
      { id: 3, upgrade: `Golden Vortex (Tier 6 Flame Barrel)`, qty: 4, },
      { id: 4, upgrade: `Phantom Kunai (Tier 6 Flame Barrel)`, qty: 3, },
      { id: 5, upgrade: `Phoenix's Lilac Umbrella (Tier 6 Flame Barrel)`, qty: 4, },
      { id: 6, upgrade: `Great Feather Mist Raven (Tier 6 Flame Barrel)`, qty: 4, },
      { id: 7, upgrade: `Purple Fume Spark (Tier 6 Flame Barrel)`, qty: 5, },
    ],
    obtain: [
      { id: 1, location: `Ashina Outskirts - Outskirts Wall Stairway`, find: `On a neigboring cliff ledge close to where the serpent's skin hangs, reached by grapple.` },
      { id: 2, location: `Ashina Outskirts - Outskirts Wall Stairway`, find: `Can be purchased from Anayama the Peddler after telling him what the Ashina Samurai want.` },
      { id: 3, location: `Ashina Castle Outskirts - Ashina Castle Gate`, find: `Explore the upper reaches beyond the gate, below a wall covered with Poison Lizards.` },
      { id: 4, location: `Ashina Castle - Ashina Castle`, find: `Lying at the roots of a tree a grapple path out the moat will take you to.` },
      { id: 5, location: `Ashina Castle - Ashina Reservoir`, find: `At the base of the castle wall behind a Senpou Temple Assasin beneath the bridge in the empty moat leading to the secret passage.` },
      { id: 5, location: `Ashina Castle - Ashina Reservoir`, find: `In the tower with a remnant for Kuro, from outside the tower grapple onto the roof and go around the tower rooftop. From there the item would be a tree to the side of the tower.` },
      { id: 6, location: `Ashina Castle - Ashina Reservoir`, find: `Upon the ledge at the end of the Reservoir you can grapple to.` },
      { id: 7, location: `Sunken Valley - Sunken Valley Passage`, find: `3x can be looted near a large cluster of monkeys.` },
      { id: 8, location: `Ashina Depths - Hidden Forest`, find: `5x can be looted in the area with the Headless.` },
      { id: 10, location: `Ashina Castle Outskirts - Ashina Castle Gate`, find: `By the wall of the corner building along the cliff edge beyond the castle gate.` },
      { id: 12, location: `Ashina Castle - Ashina Castle`, find: `Beneath the shade of a tree overlooking the moat and castle bridge.` },
      { id: 13, location: `Ashina Castle - Upper Tower Antechamber`, find: `By the 2x samurai strategising over a map in a room with a hole in the ceiling.` },
      { id: 14, location: `Ashina Castle - Old Grave`, find: `Taking the direction towards the Great Serpent Shrine from the Old Grave, by a wall overlooking the moat.` },
      { id: 15, location: `Ashina Castle - Abandoned Dungeon`, find: `From the Underground Waterway Idol, as you go towards the water you will encounter the item.` },
      { id: 16, location: `Senpou Temple Mt. Kongo - `, find: `After exiting the house where the Senpou Temple idol, turn left and go around the corner to find 1x Gachiin's Sugar. Now go the opposite way (right from the exit) and you'll spot another item. This is 1x Scrap Iron.` },
      { id: 17, location: `Ashina Outskirts, Ashina Castle, Senpou Temple Mt. Kongo, Sunken Valley, Ashina Depths`, find: `Any Memorial Mob Merchant after receiving the Dragon's Tally Board`,  },
    ],
    farm: [
      { id: 1, enemy: `Bandits`, location: `Hirata Estate`, chance: `Common` },
      { id: 3, enemy: `Bandit Taro Troopers`, location: `Hirata Estate`, chance: `Common` },
      { id: 2, enemy: `Ashina Swordsmen`, location: `Ashina Outskirts, Ashina Castle` },
      { id: 2, enemy: `Ashina Spearmen`, location: `Ashina Outskirts, Ashina Castle` },
      { id: 2, enemy: `Ashina Taro Troopers`, location: `Ashina Outskirts, Ashina Castle`, chance: `Rare` },
      { id: 3, enemy: `Senpou Temple Assassins`, location: `Ashina Castle Gate, Ashina Castle, Senpou Temple Mt. Kongo`, chance: `Common` },
      { id: 3, enemy: `Monk Taro Troopers`, location: `Senpou Temple Mt. Kongo` },
      { id: 4, enemy: `Glaive Monks`, location: `Senpou Temple Mt. Kongo`,  chance: `Common` },
      { id: 5, enemy: `Spear Mercenary`, location: `Ashina Castle - Old Gra ve` },
      { id: 6, enemy: `Ashina Samurai`, location: `Ashina Castle - ` }, 
      { id: 1, enemy: `Interior Ministry Shinobi`, location: `Ashina Castle , Hirata Estate` },
      { id: 4, enemy: `Dual-Wielding White Monkeys`, location: `Sunken Valley - Sunken Valley Passage`, chance: `Common` },
      { id: 7, enemy: `Nightjar Shinobi (grey feathers)`, location: `Ashina Castle, Sunken Valley - Bodhisattva Valley` },
    ],
    img: `scrap-iron.webp`
  },
  {
    id: 2,
    title: `Scrap Magnetite`,
    description: `Magnetic ore mined in Ashina,

    Base material commonly used in Prothetic Tool upgrades of intermediate and higher rank.
    
    Forging with magnetite produces a hard steel: a precious commodity in Ashina. Bedrock offering up this ore is constantly mined out, making it a rare one at that.`,
    value: `Uncommon`,
    valueSym: 'U',
    usage: [
      { id: 6, location: `Ashina Castle - Upper Tower Ashina Dojo`, find: `Beneath a window in an adjoining room of the dojo leading out to the rooftops.` },
      { id: 1, upgrade: `Lazulite Sacred Flame (Tier 5 Loaded Spear)`, qty: 3, },
      { id: 2, upgrade: `Lazulite Shuriken (Tier 6 Flame Barrel)`, qty: 6, },
      { id: 3, upgrade: `Golden Vortex (Tier 6 Flame Barrel)`, qty: 4, },
      { id: 4, upgrade: `Phantom Kunai (Tier 6 Flame Barrel)`, qty: 3, },
      { id: 5, upgrade: `Phoenix's Lilac Umbrella (Tier 6 Flame Barrel)`, qty: 4, },
      { id: 6, upgrade: `Great Feather Mist Raven (Tier 6 Flame Barrel)`, qty: 4, },
      { id: 7, upgrade: `Purple Fume Spark (Tier 6 Flame Barrel)`, qty: 5, },
    ],
    obtain: [
      { id: 1, location: `Ashina Depths - Hidden Forest`, find: `Close to Headless in the depths` },
      { id: 2, location: `Ashina Outskirts - Under-Shrine Valley`, find: `Past the x3 burials, through the underwater cave, close to Headless among the subterranean burials. (Requirement: Mibu Breathing Technique Latent Skill.)` },
      { id: 3, location: `Ashina Depths - Hidden Forest`, find: `Dropped by the Mist Noble upon defeat.` },
      { id: 4, location: `Fountainhead Palace`, find: `From entering the first house upon reaching the area, head outside to explore and you'll find 1x by an Okami Swordsmen on a broken wooden bridge before the lake.` },
      { id: 5, location: `Fountainhead Palace`, find: `Inside the house of the noble courtyard, you'll find a patrol of a noble and 2x Okami Swordsmen, take a right at the first intersection then a left and you'll arrive at a chamber with the item.` },
      { id: 6, location: `Fountainhead Palace`, find: `From the old woman located on the rooftops of a half-sunken building, dive under the building to pick locate and pick up 1x. (Requirement: Mibu Breathing Technique Latent Skill.)` },
      { id: 7, location: `Ashina Outskirts (during Interior Ministry invasion)`, find: `Found at the base of one of the sniper towers near the Ogre.` },
      { id: 8, location: `Ashina Castle - Abandoned Dungeon`, find: `x2 for giving Doujun, the surgeon in the abandoned dungeon, the red carp eyes.` },
    ],
    farm: [
      { id: 1, enemy: `Bandits (late game)`, location: `Hirata Estate`, chance: `Uncommon` },
      { id: 3, enemy: `Bandit Taro Troopers`, location: `Hirata Estate`, chance: `Rare` },
      { id: 2, enemy: `Ashina Swordsmen`, location: `Ashina Outskirts, Ashina Castle`, chance: `Rare` },
      { id: 2, enemy: `Ashina Spearmen`, location: `Ashina Outskirts, Ashina Castle`, chance: `Rare` },
      { id: 2, enemy: `Ashina Taro Troopers`, location: `Ashina Outskirts, Ashina Castle`, chance: `Rare` },
      { id: 1, enemy: `Monk`, location: `Senpou Temple Mt. Kongo` },
      { id: 4, enemy: `Glaive Monks`, location: `Senpou Temple Mt. Kongo`, chance: `Uncommon` },
      { id: 3, enemy: `Senpou Temple Assassins`, location: `Ashina Castle Gate, Ashina Castle, Senpou Temple Mt. Kongo`, chance: `Rare` },
      { id: 2, enemy: `Palace Nobles (Blue Garb)`, location: `Fountainhead Palace` },
      { id: 3, enemy: `Bell Taro Troopers`, location: `Ashina Depths` },
      { id: 4, enemy: `Okami Warriors`, location: `Fountainhead Palace` },
      { id: 5, enemy: `Spear Mercenary`, location: `Ashina Castle - Old Grave` },
      { id: 5, enemy: `Spear Mercenary`, location: `Hirata Estate`, chance: `Uncommon` },
      { id: 6, enemy: `Interior Ministry Shinobi`, location: `Ashina Castle, Hirata Estate` },
      { id: 6, enemy: `Interior Ministry Duel-Wielding Swordsman`, location: `Ashina Castle` },
      { id: 7, enemy: `Nightjar Shinobi (grey feathers)`, location: `Ashina Castle, Sunken Valley - Bodhisattva Valley` },
      { id: 3, enemy: `Wall Demons`, location: `Sunken Valley - Bodhisattva Valley`, chance: `Common` },
    ],
    img: `scrap-magnetite.webp`
  },
  {
    id: 3,
    title: `Adamantite Scrap`,
    description: `Adamantite ore with a dull, silvery shine.

    Base material commonly used in advanced Prosthetic Tool Upgrades.
    
    Adamantite can only be mined in the oldest parts of Ashina. Ancient rock and soil is said to attract the grace of gods, perhaps lending this metal its supple strength.`,
    value: `Rare`,
    valueSym: 'R',
    usage: [
      { id: 1, upgrade: `Golden Vortex`, qty: 2, },
      { id: 2, upgrade: `Sparking Axe`, qty: 2, },
      { id: 3, upgrade: `Leaping Flame`, qty: 2, },
      { id: 4, upgrade: `Sen Throw`, qty: 2, },
      { id: 5, upgrade: `Piercing Sabimaru`, qty: 4, },
      { id: 6, upgrade: `Purple Fume Spark`, qty: 2, },
      { id: 7, upgrade: `Lazulite Shuriken `, qty: 5, },
      { id: 8, upgrade: `Lazulite Sabimaru`, qty: 4, },
      { id: 9, upgrade: `Lazulite Axe`, qty: 5, },
    ],
    obtain: [
      { id: 1, location: `Ashina Depths - Hidden Forest`, find: `1x can be found inside the temple of the Mist Noble.` },
      { id: 2, location: `Ashina Depths - Mibu Village`, find: `Sold by the Merchant Exiled Memorial Mob for 600 Sen` },
      { id: 3, location: `Ashina Depths - Mibu Village`, find: `From the shrine with the sake, grapple up and go along the wall to pick up 1.` },
      { id: 4, location: `Ashina Depths - Mibu Village`, find: `1x can be found behind the structure and outside of the house where the drinking NPC is found.` },
      { id: 5, location: `Ashina Depths - Mibu Village`, find: `Travel to the Mibu Village idol and leave the idol toward the village and lake. Once at the lake jump in and swim toward the right side where the dock is located - you can grapple up here. Once grappled up, go straight ahead and down into the ravine. You'll find the item along with a Pine Resin Ember which is located on the house at the end of the ravine.` },
      { id: 6, location: `Fountainhead Palace - `, find: `from the large courtyard, you can acquire 1 inside the building where there is a flute player and beasts.` },
      { id: 7, location: `Fountainhead Palace - `, find: `1x can be acquired inside the house where a 1x masked guard with a polearm, and a red-robbed noble can be found.` },
      { id: 8, location: `Fountainhead Palace - `, find: `there is 1x lying around the area where the Sakura Bull of the Palace is encountered.` },
      { id: 9, location: `Fountainhead Palace - `, find: `dive underneath the building where the woman standing on a rooftop is found, where you'll find 1 on the roof of a half-sunken building; and 1 more can be acquired inside the cave of the Great Carp - but beware to head inside the cave once the Great Carp is dead.` },
    ],
    farm: [
      { id: 1, enemy: `Interior Ministry Shinobi`, location: `Ashina Castle` },
      { id: 1, enemy: `Interior Ministry Shinobi (late game)`, location: `Hirata Estate` },
      { id: 4, enemy: `Glaive Monks`, location: `Senpou Temple Mt. Kongo`, chance: `Rare` },
      { id: 3, enemy: `Okami Warriors`, location: `Fountainhead Palace` },
      { id: 4, enemy: `Interior Ministry Red Guard Swordsmen`, location: `Ashina Outskirts, Ashina Castle` },
      { id: 5, enemy: `Spear Mercenary (late game)`, location: `Hirata Estate`, chance: `Rare` },
    ],
    img: `adamantite-scrap.webp`
  },
  {
    id: 4,
    title: `Black Gunpowder`,
    description: `Black grains forming the base of gunpowder.

    Material used in alchemical Prosthetic Tool upgrades, including those of an explosive and occultic nature.
    
    Even the most mundane form of gunpowder has a wide variety of applications.`,
    value: `Common`,
    valueSym: 'C',
    usage: [
      { id: 1, upgrade: `Leaping Flame`, qty: 8, },
      { id: 2, upgrade: `Sparking Axe`, qty: 4, },
      { id: 3, upgrade: `Okinaga's Flame Vent`, qty: 6, },
      { id: 4, upgrade: `Double Divine Abduction`, qty: 2, },
    ],
    obtain: [
      { id: 1, location: `Ashina Castle Outskirts - Outskirts Wall Stairway`, find: `Can be purchased from Anayama the Peddler after telling him what the Ashina Samurai want.` },
      { id: 2, location: `Ashina Depths - Poison Pools`, find: `from the Poison filled pool, grapple onto the ledge, and ahead of the rocks, you'll find 2x.` },
      { id: 3, location: `Ashina Depths - Mibu Village`, find: `1x can be found in the area of the village right before passing by the tall grass.` },
      { id: 4, location: `Ashina Depths - Mibu Village`, find: `From the shrine with the sake, grapple up and go along the wall to pick up 1.` },
      { id: 5, location: `Ashina Castle - Ashina Castle`, find: `In a courtyard with an amored bell-weielding Taro Trooper.` },
      { id: 6, location: `Ashina Castle - Old Grave`, find: `By the broken bridge that once connected Ashina Castle to the Underbridge Valley.` },
      { id: 7, location: `Abandoned Dungeon - `, find: `In the room where the player will fight the Shichimen Warrior the item would be there.` },
      { id: 8, location: `Abandoned Dungeon - `, find: `From the Underground Waterway idol and this time go toward the water. Pick up 1x Scrap Iron and swim across the water until you see a boat and some items.One of the items is the Powder.` },
      { id: 9, location: `Ashina Outskirts, Ashina Castle, Senpou Temple Mt. Kongo, Sunken Valley, Ashina Depths`, find: `Any Memorial Mob Merchant after receiving the Dragon's Tally Board`,  },
    ],
    farm: [
      { id: 1, enemy: `Bandit Bowmen`, location: `Hirata Estate`, chance: `Common` },
      { id: 1, enemy: `Interior Ministry Shinobi`, location: `Hirata Estate`, chance: `Common` },
      { id: 1, enemy: `Sunken Valley Cannoneers`, location: `Ashina Outskirts, Poison Pools, Ashina Castle` },
      { id: 2, enemy: `Ashina Riflemen`, location: `Ashina Outskirts, Ashina Castle` },
      { id: 3, enemy: `Senpou Temple Assassins`, location: `Ashina Castle Gate, Ashina Castle, Senpou Temple Mt. Kongo` },
      { id: 4, enemy: `Sunken Valley Rifleman`, location: `Sunken Valley` },
      { id: 3, enemy: `Sunken Valley Scatter-Shots`, location: `Poison Pools, Gun Fort, Sunken Valley` },
      { id: 5, enemy: `Centipede Men`, location: `Senpou Temple, Sunken Valley`, chance: `Common` },
      { id: 6, enemy: `Nightjar Shinobi (black feathers)`, location: `Ashina Castle, Sunken Valley - Bodhisattva Valley` },
      { id: 7, enemy: `Senpou Interior Ministry Assassins`, location: `Ashina Castle` },
      { id: 1, enemy: `Pyro Bomber Monks`, location: `Senpou Temple Mt. Kongo`, chance: `Common` },
    ],
    img: `black-gunpowder.png`
  },
  {
    id: 5,
    title: `Yellow Gunpowder`,
    description: `Amber-colored grains forming the base for powerful gunpowder. A precious commodity only found in the Sunken Valley.

    Used for explosive Prosthetic Tool upgrade of intermediate and higher rank.
    
    The yield from yellow powder is greater than that of black, lending the valley stronghold defenses their fiery vigor.`,
    value: `Uncommon`,
    valueSym: 'U',
    usage: [
      { id: 1, upgrade: `Lazulite Sacred Flame (Tier 5 Loaded Spear)`, qty: 7, },
      { id: 2, upgrade: `Okinaga's Flame Vent (Tier 6 Flame Barrel)`, qty: 4, },
      { id: 3, upgrade: `Sparking Axe (Tier 6 Flame Barrel)`, qty: 2, },
      { id: 4, upgrade: `Great Feather Mist Raven (Tier 6 Flame Barrel)`, qty: 4, },
      { id: 5, upgrade: `Leaping Flame (Tier 6 Flame Barrel)`, qty: 4, },
      { id: 7, upgrade: `Suzaku's Lotus Umbrella (Tier 6 Flame Barrel)`, qty: 6, },
    ],
    obtain: [
      { id: 1, location: `Sunken Valley - Sunken Valley Passage`, find: `1x found after the Riven Cave Sculpter's Idol. Navigate past the Buddha statues and group of monkeys to the bottom of the ravine with the poison pools. It is found towards the back end.` },
      { id: 2, location: `Sunken Valley - Sunken Valley Passage`, find: `Sold by the Merchant Toxic Memorial Mob for 720 Sen` },
      { id: 3, location: `Sunken Valley - Sunken Valley Passage`, find: `1x can be found near the Bodhisattva Idol.` },
      { id: 4, location: `Sunken Valley - `, find: `1x located inside the shelter of a cave located near the first Sculptor's Idol found.` },
      { id: 5, location: `Sunken Valley - Gun Fort`, find: `1x inside the heavy gunner room past the Gun Fort Idol.` },
      { id: 6, location: `Sunken Valley - Gun Fort`, find: `3x found after defeating the enemy deep within the cave after crossing the hanging bridge.` },
      { id: 7, location: `Sunken Valley - Gun Fort`, find: `2x dropped by the Long-Arm Centipede Giraffe upon defeat.` },
      { id: 8, location: `Sunken Valley - Gun Fort`, find: `Under the floor where you can drop through the hole of the room where Long-Arm Centipede Giraffe is encountered.` },
      { id: 9, location: `Ashina Depths - Poison Pools`, find: `1x can be looted at the far righthand side of a cliff edge of the Poison Pool, while 1x can be found at the top of a wall-to-wall you can jump at.` },
      { id: 10, location: `Ashina Depths - Hidden Forest`, find: `1x can be found inside the temple of the Mist Noble.` },
      { id: 11, location: `Fountainhead Palace`, find: `After locating the noble courtyard, head inside the house and towards a pathway that leads to a noble flute-player to find 4x.` },
      { id: 12, location: `Senpou Temple Mt. Kongo - Temple Grounds`, find: `1x dropped by the Long-Arm Centipede Sen-Un upon defeat.` },
    ],
    farm: [
      { id: 1, enemy: `Bandit Bowmen (late game)`, location: `Hirata Estate`, chance: `Uncommon` },
      { id: 1, enemy: `Sunken Valley Cannoneers`, location: `Ashina Outskirts, Poison Pools, Ashina Castle` },
      { id: 3, enemy: `Sunken Valley Riflemen`, location: `Poison Pools, Gun Fort, Sunken Valley` },
      { id: 2, enemy: `Ashina Riflemen`, location: `Ashina Outskirts, Ashina Castle`, chance: `Rare` },
      { id: 5, enemy: `Centipede Men`, location: `Senpou Temple, Sunken Valley`, chance: `Rare` },
      { id: 3, enemy: `Sunken Valley Scatter-Shots`, location: `Poison Pools, Gun Fort, Sunken Valley` },
      { id: 4, enemy: `Dual-Wielding White Monkeys`, location: `Sunken Valley - Sunken Valley Passage` },
      { id: 5, enemy: `Interior Ministry Gunman`, location: `Ashina Outskirts, Ashina Castle` },
      { id: 1, enemy: `Pyro Bomber Monks`, location: `Senpou Temple Mt. Kongo`, chance: `Rare` },
    ],
    img: `yellow-gunpowder.webp`
  },
  {
    id: 6,
    title: `Fulminated Mercury`,
    description: `Highly precious grains forming the base for a devastating form of gunpowder.

    Used in explosive Prosthetic Tool upgrades of advanced rank.
    
    Created in secret by the Interior Ministry using knowledge from across southern seas. The central forces' military might owes much to this tiny tweak of chemistry.`,
    value: `Rare`,
    valueSym: 'R',
    usage: [
      { id: 1, upgrade: `Leaping Flame (Tier 5 Loaded Spear)`, qty: 1, },
      { id: 2, upgrade: `Great Feather Mist Raven (Tier 5 Mist Raven)`, qty: 3, },
      { id: 3, upgrade: `Purple Fume Spark (Tier 5 Firecracker)`, qty: 2, },
      { id: 4, upgrade: `Suzaku's Lotus Umbrella (Tier 5 Loaded Umbrella)`, qty: 2, },
      { id: 5, upgrade: `Lazulite Sabimaru (Tier 6 Sabimaru)`, qty: 4, },
      { id: 6, upgrade: `Lazulite Axe (Tier 6 Loaded Axe)`, qty: 3, },
      { id: 7, upgrade: `Lazulite Sacred Flame (Tier 6 Flame Barrel)`, qty: 4, },
    ],
    obtain: [
      { id: 1, location: `Hirata Estate - `, find: `2x can be found at the Hirata Estate near the second Juzou encounter (2nd Memory)` },
      { id: 2, location: `Sunken Valley - Bodhisattva Valley`, find: `1x can be found in Bodhisattva Valley behind a rock across an island with white monkeys, in the poisonous water area. (only appears in late game)` },
      { id: 3, location: `Ashina Outskirts - `, find: `1x can be found in Ashina Outskirts after it is set on fire, near the Ogre, next to a canon.` },
      { id: 4, location: `Ashina Outskirts - `, find: `1x can be found in Ashina Outskirts after it is set on fire, at the top of the stairs where the original Ogre was.` },
      { id: 5, location: `Ashina Castle - `, find: `1x can be found in Ashina Castle by the stairs to the castle tower after it is set on fire.` },
      { id: 6, location: `Ashina Castle - Ashina Reservoir`, find: `1x can be found in Ashina Reservoir after it is set on fire, behind Seven Spears miniboss.` },
    ],
    farm: [
      { id: 1, enemy: `Sunken Valley Cannoneers`, location: `Ashina Outskirts, Poison Pools, Ashina Castle`, chance: `Rare` },
      { id: 2, enemy: `Sunken Valley Scatter-Shots`, location: `Poison Pools, Gun Fort, Sunken Valley`, chance: `Rare` },
      { id: 3, enemy: `Interior Ministry Gunman`, location: `Ashina Outskirts, Ashina Castle`, chance: `Uncommon` },
      { id: 4, enemy: `Interior Ministry Poison Shinobi (late game)`, location: `Hirata Estate`, chnace: `Rare` },
    ],
    img: `fulminated-mercury.webp`
  },
  {
    id: 7,
    title: `Lump of Fat Wax`,
    description: `These lumps of fatty wax form inside the body in rare circumstances.

    Can be used for intermediate and higher Occultic upgrades for Prosthetic Tools.
    
    Considered omens of disease, they are known to grow larger as the illness worsens. It's best not to to let one grow any larger after it turns brown.`,
    value: `Uncommon`,
    valueSym: 'U',
    usage: [
      { id: 1, upgrade: `Lazulite Sacred Flame (Tier 5 Loaded Spear)`, qty: 3, },
      { id: 2, upgrade: `Lazulite Shuriken (Tier 6 Flame Barrel)`, qty: 6, },
      { id: 3, upgrade: `Golden Vortex (Tier 6 Flame Barrel)`, qty: 4, },
      { id: 4, upgrade: `Phantom Kunai (Tier 6 Flame Barrel)`, qty: 3, },
      { id: 5, upgrade: `Phoenix's Lilac Umbrella (Tier 6 Flame Barrel)`, qty: 4, },
      { id: 6, upgrade: `Great Feather Mist Raven (Tier 6 Flame Barrel)`, qty: 4, },
      { id: 7, upgrade: `Purple Fume Spark (Tier 6 Flame Barrel)`, qty: 5, },
    ],
    obtain: [
      { id: 1, location: `Ashina Depths - Hidden Forest`, find: `Close to Headless in the depths` },
      { id: 2, location: `Ashina Depths - Mibu Village`, find: `past the pack of wolves, drop down the house and check the woodpile to find one.` },
      { id: 3, location: `Ashina Depths - Mibu Village`, find: `after defeating O'Rin of the Water, before crossing the bridge, you'll find one by the corner along the edge.` },
      { id: 4, location: `Ashina Depths - Abandoned Dungeon`, find: `3x are rewarded for delivering a suitable patient to Doujun.` },
      { id: 5, location: `Ashina Outskirts`, find: `3x can be bought from Anayama the Peddler if Kotaro is sent to him.` },
    ],
    farm: [
      { id: 1, enemy: `Ashina Peasant Lookouts`, location: `Ashina Castle, Ashina Outskirts`, chance: `Rare` },
      { id: 1, enemy: `Monks`, location: `Senpou Temple Mt. Kongo`, chance: `Uncommon` },
      { id: 1, enemy: `Infested Monks`, location: `Senpou Temple Mt. Kongo`, chance: `Uncommon` },
      { id: 2, enemy: `Sunken Valley Old Maid`, location: `Gun Fort` },
      { id: 3, enemy: `Palace Nobles (Blue Garb)`, location: `Fountainhead Palace` },
      { id: 4, enemy: `Interior Ministry Poison Shinobi`, location: `Ashina Depths - Mibu Village` },
      { id: 5, enemy: `Mibu Village People`, location: `Ashina Depths - Mibu Village` },
    ],
    img: `lump-of-fat-wax.webp`
  },
  {
    id: 8,
    title: `Lump of Grave Wax`,
    description: `A lump of fatty wax that has formed inside the body and turned pitch black.

    Used for occultic Prosthetic Tool upgrades of an advanced nature.
    
    A long-suffered illness will see the growth turn large and blacker still. It is customary to run water over the site of an extracted growth.`,
    value: `Rare`,
    valueSym: 'R',
    usage: [
      { id: 1, upgrade: `Lazulite Sacred Flame (Tier 5 Loaded Spear)`, qty: 3, },
      { id: 2, upgrade: `Lazulite Shuriken (Tier 6 Flame Barrel)`, qty: 6, },
      { id: 3, upgrade: `Golden Vortex (Tier 6 Flame Barrel)`, qty: 4, },
      { id: 4, upgrade: `Phantom Kunai (Tier 6 Flame Barrel)`, qty: 3, },
      { id: 5, upgrade: `Phoenix's Lilac Umbrella (Tier 6 Flame Barrel)`, qty: 4, },
      { id: 6, upgrade: `Great Feather Mist Raven (Tier 6 Flame Barrel)`, qty: 4, },
      { id: 7, upgrade: `Purple Fume Spark (Tier 6 Flame Barrel)`, qty: 5, },
    ],
    obtain: [
      { id: 1, location: `Ashina Depths - Hidden Forest`, find: `Close to Headless in the depths` },
      { id: 2, location: `Ashina Outskirts - Under-Shrine Valley`, find: `Past the x3 burials, through the underwater cave, close to Headless among the subterranean burials. (Requirement: Mibu Breathing Technique Latent Skill.)` },
      { id: 3, location: `Ashina Depths - Hidden Forest`, find: `Dropped by the Mist Noble upon defeat.` },
      { id: 4, location: `Fountainhead Palace`, find: `From entering the first house upon reaching the area, head outside to explore and you'll find 1x by an Okami Swordsmen on a broken wooden bridge before the lake.` },
      { id: 5, location: `Fountainhead Palace`, find: `Inside the house of the noble courtyard, you'll find a patrol of a noble and 2x Okami Swordsmen, take a right at the first intersection then a left and you'll arrive at a chamber with the item.` },
      { id: 6, location: `Fountainhead Palace`, find: `From the old woman located on the rooftops of a half-sunken building, dive under the building to pick locate and pick up 1x. (Requirement: Mibu Breathing Technique Latent Skill.)` },
      { id: 7, location: `Ashina Outskirts (during Interior Ministry invasion)`, find: `Found at the base of one of the sniper towers near the Ogre.` },
      { id: 8, location: `Ashina Castle - Abandoned Dungeon`, find: `x2 for giving Doujun, the surgeon in the abandoned dungeon, the red carp eyes.` },
    ],
    farm: [
      { id: 1, enemy: `Monks`, location: `Senpou Temple Mt. Kongo`, chance: `Rare` },
      { id: 2, enemy: `Palace Nobles (Blue Garb)`, location: `Fountainhead Palace` },
      { id: 3, enemy: `Bell Taro Troopers`, location: `Ashina Depths - Water Mill` },
    ],
    img: `lump-of-grave-wax.webp`
  },
  {
    id: 9,
    title: `Lapis Lazuli`,
    description: `Precious azure lazulite, used for the highest level of Prosthetic Tool upgrades.

    Fountainhead lazulite is a symbol of eternity, and anything forged with it will never break nor rust thanks to the blessing of the Divine Dragon. Tools forged with lazulite transcend human intellect, and are dubbed as treasures of the Divine Dragon.`,
    value: 'Limited',
    valueSym: 'L',
    usage: [
      { id: 1, upgrade: `Lazulite Sabimaru (Tier 5 Loaded Spear)`, qty: 2, },
      { id: 2, upgrade: `Lazulite Axe (Tier 5 Loaded Spear)`, qty: 3, },
      { id: 3, upgrade: `Lazulite Sacred Flame (Tier 5 Loaded Spear)`, qty: 3, },
      { id: 4, upgrade: `Lazulite Shuriken (Tier 6 Flame Barrel)`, qty: 2, },
    ],
    obtain: [
      { id: 1, location: `Fountainhead Palace - `, find: `Two purchasable from the Fountainhead Pot Noble (Pot Noble Harunaga or Pot Noble Koremori) for 6 Treasure Carp Scale each.` },
      { id: 2, location: `Fountainhead Palace - `, find: `x1 given by Pot Noble Harunaga or Pot Noble Koremori after feeding their 'Truly Precious Bait' to the Great Colored Carp.` },
      { id: 3, location: `Fountainhead Palace - `, find: `x1 dropped by Shichimen Warrior, found at the base of a waterfall in the Fountainhead Palace area.` },
      { id: 4, location: `Ashina Castle Grounds - `, find: `Two dropped by Demon of Hatred, found at the Ashina Castle Grounds late in the game.` },
    ],
    img: `lapis-lazuli.webp`
  },
  {
    id: 10,
    title: `Phantom Kunai`,
    description: `A kunai used by Lady Butterfly that can be used to upgrade the Loaded Shuriken.

    A ringing sound is heard when the kunai is thrown, and phantom butterflies appear in the kunai's trail.
    
    Since childhood, Lady Butterfly had accumulated much experience in Usui's forest, far from civilization along Tozan Trail. His forest is filled with mist and mystifications, making it ideal for training in illusion techniques.`,
    value: 'Unique',
    valueSym: 'Un',
    usage: [
      { id: 1, upgrade: `Phantom Kunai (Tier 2 Loaded Shuriken)`, qty: 1, },
    ],
    obtain: [
      { id: 1, location: `Ashina Outskirts - `, find: `Sold by the merchant Anayama the Peddler for 3,000 Sen` },
    ],
    img: `phantom-kunai.webp`
  },
  {
    id: 11,
    title: `Pine Resin Ember`,
    description: `A piece of resin that contains a continuously smoldering flame. Can be used to upgrade the Flame Vent.

    The resin was found in a black pine within the forests of Mibu Village. The ever-smoldering flames acted as a landmark to find one's way to the village. In time the villagers came to loathe the flames, and the black pines were lost. Those who defended the flame were equally loathed.`,
    value: 'Unique',
    valueSym: 'Un',
    usage: [
      { id: 1, upgrade: `Phantom Kunai (Tier 2 Loaded Shuriken)`, qty: 1, },
    ],
    obtain: [
      { id: 1, location: `Ashina Depths - Mibu Village`, find: `Beyond the broken pier on the opposite bank of Mibu Village lake, take the right downward sloping path and follow it to its end where the item can be found on the roof of a the last house.` },
    ],
    img: `pine-resin-ember.webp`
  },
  {
    id: 12,
    title: `Malcontent's Ring`,
    description: `An old ring well-suited for slender fingers. "Kingfisher" is engraved on the underside. Can be used to upgrade the Finger Whistle Prosthetic Tool.

    Wearing this ring as you blow the finger whistle will create a somber tune.  The weeping voice is full of solitude and beauty. Possible somber enough to temporarily quell a voice of rage.`,
    value: 'Unique',
    valueSym: 'Un',
    usage: [
      { id: 1, upgrade: `Malcontent (Tier 2 Finger Whistle)`, qty: 1, },
    ],
    obtain: [
      { id: 1, location: `Ashina Depths - Guardian Ape's Burrow`, find: `Dropped from the Shichimen Warrior that spawns in the Guardian Ape's Burrow after severing the immortality of the Headless Ape and after completing Mibu Village. (You will have needed to defeated the Guardian Ape in the Sunken Valley in order to get the Headless Ape to spawn.)` },
    ],
    img: `malcontent-ring.webp`
  },
]
